Class Snake

Snake
public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    Snake.Direction direction
    it is used to check the length of the Snake
    java.util.LinkedList<Tile> location
    This is the direction taken by the Snake

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Snake​(Board board)
    Creates a Snake the length of three tiles.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkWinCondition()
    Checks if the size of the Snake has exceeded the length of 40 tiles which is the win condition for the game

    Gets the size of the Snake

    Makes the Snake go Down

    Makes the Snake go left

  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake​(Board board)
      Creates a Snake the length of three tiles. It'll go down by default.
      Parameters:
      board - the board in which the Snake will be placed

  • Method Details

    • toggleAlive

      public boolean toggleAlive()
      Will make the Snake be dead by changing the status of alive
      Returns:
      alive

    • isAlive

      Returns:

    • getSize

      Returns:
      size of the Snake

    • checkWinCondition

      public boolean checkWinCondition()
      Checks if the size of the Snake has exceeded the length of 40 tiles which is the win condition for the game
      Returns:
      whether size is greater than 40
